title: Japan Oceanfront Retreat in Kushimoto with Indoor and Outdoor Hot Springs
description:
Enter a state of serenity at this Japanese retreat nestled along the scenic coastline of Kushimoto in Wakayama Prefecture. Steeped in tradition, the hotel features everything you need for an extraordinary Japan stay, including open-air hot springs, indoor mineral baths and a serene lounge where you can sip saké after soaking.

Here, you’ll be perfectly positioned to immerse yourself in Wakayama’s natural beauty, with the Hashigui-iwa Rocks and Kushimoto Marine Park within easy reach. The jewel in Wakayama’s crown, Kumano Kodō - a series of ancient pilgrimage routes once sacred to emperors and samurai alike - is just a two-hour drive away, for those wanting to dive deeper into Japan’s spiritual heritage.
